section.title: Installation Script
section.source:
mkdir /opt/OpenIMSCore cd /opt/OpenIMSCore
mkdir FHoSS svn checkout http://svn.berlios.de/svnroot/repos/openimscore/FHoSS/trunk FHoSS
mkdir ser_ims svn checkout http://svn.berlios.de/svnroot/repos/openimscore/ser_ims/trunk ser_ims
cd FHoSS ant gen compile deploy cd ..
cd ser_ims make all cd ..
mysql -u root -p < FHoSS/scripts/hssdb.sql mysql -u root -p < FHoSS/scripts/userdata.sql
mysql -u root -p < ser_ims/cfg/icscf.sql mysql -u root -p < ser_ims/cfg/sip2ims.sql
cp ser_ims/cfg/*.cfg . cp ser_ims/cfg/*.xml . cp ser_ims/cfg/*.sh .
